column4: I believe I have messed my pc up completely.  After several hours yesterday I finally managed to install kubuntu onto my pc(ubuntu 7.10 and ubuntu 8.04 refuse to load).  Tonight for no reason at all I decided to try 7.10 again and so as a result, it didn't fully install and my question is this: can I still use my kubuntu setup? or did I just mess things up?
should I at least see if it will boot?
it took me 34 times to get Ubuntu working on my laptop...the good news is that...if you are persistant..it works out..and you'll be glad you were
3-4 times even..not 34 times..I would have def givin up by then
